origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'HealthFinance.get_funding_methods', 'description': 'Get common funding methods in the healthcare industry', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_methods', 'description': 'a list of common funding methods in the healthcare industry'}]}, {'name': 'HealthFinance.get_funding_cases', 'description': 'Get funding cases of healthcare companies', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_cases', 'description': 'a list of funding cases of healthcare companies'}]}, {'name': 'HealthFinance.get_funding_trends', 'description': 'Get current funding trends in the healthcare industry', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_trends', 'description': 'a list of current funding trends in the healthcare industry'}]}, {'name': 'HealthFinance.get_funding_advice', 'description': 'Get funding advice based on a specific healthcare project', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'project_description', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'description of the healthcare project'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_advice', 'description': 'funding advice based on the project description'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名医疗健康行业的创业者，想了解医疗健康行业的融资情况。首先，我想获取医疗健康行业常见的融资方式。然后，我想获取一些医疗健康企业的融资案例。接着，我想获取当前医疗健康行业的融资趋势。最后，基于我的医疗项目，我希望得到一些融资建议。
获取医疗健康行业常见的融资方式
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
HealthFinance.get_funding_methods
当前工具的参数是什么?
{'funding_methods': ['Venture Capital', 'Private Equity', 'IPO', 'Government Grants', 'Strategic Partnerships']}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'funding_methods': ['Venture Capital', 'Private Equity', 'IPO', 'Government Grants', 'Strategic Partnerships']}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取一些医疗健康企业的融资案例
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
HealthFinance.get_funding_cases
当前工具的参数是什么?
{'funding_cases': [{'company': 'Moderna', 'funding_method': 'Venture Capital', 'amount': '$240M'}, {'company': 'Teladoc Health', 'funding_method': 'IPO', 'amount': '$1.3B'}]}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'funding_cases': [{'company': 'Moderna', 'funding_method': 'Venture Capital', 'amount': '$240M'}, {'company': 'Teladoc Health', 'funding_method': 'IPO', 'amount': '$1.3B'}]}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取当前医疗健康行业的融资趋势
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
HealthFinance.get_funding_trends
当前工具的参数是什么?
{'funding_trends': ['Increased focus on digital health', 'Growth in biotech funding', 'Shift towards preventive healthcare']}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'funding_trends': ['Increased focus on digital health', 'Growth in biotech funding', 'Shift towards preventive healthcare']}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
基于我的医疗项目，提供一些融资建议
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
HealthFinance.get_funding_advice
当前工具的参数'project_description'的值是什么?
开发一种新型数字健康平台，旨在通过AI技术提供个性化的健康管理服务。

{'funding_advice': ['Consider applying for government grants focused on digital health innovation', 'Seek venture capital from firms specializing in AI and healthcare', 'Explore strategic partnerships with established healthcare providers']}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'funding_advice': ['Consider applying for government grants focused on digital health innovation', 'Seek venture capital from firms specializing in AI and healthcare', 'Explore strategic partnerships with established healthcare providers']}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 汇总医疗健康行业的融资情况，包括常见融资方式、融资案例、融资趋势以及针对特定项目的融资建议。
